metadata.dcterms:title: CCRI 1921 Census of Canada: Aggregate data and geography = CCRI 1921 Recensement du Canada: Données agrégées et cadre géographique
metadata.dcterms:creator: Gaffield, Chad
Baskerville, Peter
St-Hilaire, Marc
Amrhein, Carl
Cadigan, Sean
Moldofsky, Byron
Darroch, Gordon
Bellavance, Claude
Normand, France
metadata.dcterms:description: This study includes two components of the research infrastructure developed by CCRI for the 1921 Census of Canada: selected digitized published tables of aggregate data and a reconstruction of the census geography.
metadata.dcterms:subject: Census
Canada--Census, 1921
metadata.dcterms:relation: See also the CCRI Census of Canada materials for 1911, 1931, 1941 and 1951.
